mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "The Backtracker", "The Carlyle", and "Buffalo Glide". SPECIAL FEATURES "1952", "A Barometer of 1952 Square Dancing", "Square Dancer", "They Followed the Square Dance Trail", "Square Dancers Entertain Serviceman", and "The Deeper Meaning". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "The Square of the Month: Walter and Betty Clopine", "Events Seen Thru the Square Dancer's Eye", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Help! For Your Square Dance Club", "The Green Sheet", "From the Floor", "Calendar of Square Dancing Events", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
